name: Dementia (itch) (Onyric Productions)
description:
HOW DEEP ARE YOU WILLING TO GO FOR THE TRUTH?

Dementia is the living nightmare of a tormented detective that lost it all while working on a case involved with a mysterious criminal order.

Enter in an all new horror experience, a looping voyage to the mind of an insane man in his search of his own memories, with influence of games like P.T or Visage.

With complete random level generation, Dementia offers the player a totally different challenge every time you open a door, cross a path, or use your phone to search for clues.

It won't be a nightmare if it doesn't have a villian... 

But it's a villian? It's real? Or it's just your own madness?

So, i will ask you again, how deep are you willing to go?
